item.description:
This event was suggested by one of our members – Leslie. She had this to say "Its 3.2 miles of obstacles! Everyone gets a Warrior helmet, a shirt, and a medal. It would be great if other men and women from the trails could get out there and join in.”

It is being listed on our site so members can coordinate with other members.

===============

The New England Warrior Dash covers about 3 miles and includes 12 different obstacles.  These include “Knee High Hell”, “Junkyard Jump”, “Satan’s Slope”, and “Muddy Mayhem”.

The Warrior Dash is a mud-crawling, fire-leaping, extreme run from hell.  This fierce running series is held on the most challenging and rugged terrain across the globe.  Warriors conquer extreme obstacles, push their limits, and celebrate with kick-ass music, beer, and warrior helmets.

The only New England events are on Saturday June 25th and Sunday June 26th at the Amesbury Sport Park.

http://www.warriordash.com/register2011_new_england.php

You can compete on Saturday, Sunday, or if you are hard core - both days.  Registration closes on June 13th at 3:00 PM.
item.why: If you aren't going to hike this sounds like the next best thing - plus you get a free warrior helmet.
item.name: Warrior Dash Adventure Race (Sunday - Day #2)
